name: Heroku Log S3
description: log drain from heroku to s3

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS Access key with access to s3 and cloudwatch logs

KMS_KEY.description: Used for creating cloudwatch log groups

DURATION.description: Seconds to buffer until we write to S3

EXPIRE_CLOUDWATCH_LOGS.description: Data retention time for cloudwatch logs in days

PUSH_TO_CLOUDWATCH.description: Data retention time for cloudwatch logs in days

STRFTIME.description: Format of your s3 `object_id` (file path); `:thread_id:` will be replaced by a unique number to prevent overwriting of the same file between reboots, in case the timestamp overlaps, :appname: can be used to split logs based on application

HTTP_PASSWORD.description: Password to prevent public from using your log drain

FILTER_PREFIX.description: Lines with this prefix will be saved to S3; non-matching lines are ignored
